title: Criticism of the Bible - Collection 32
description:
Criticism of the Bible - Collection 32 :

We have 28 titles here:

-  Aitken (Ed.) - T&T Clark Companion to the Septuagint (2015)

-  Aune (Ed.) - The Blackwell Companion to the New Testament (2010)

-  Baker - Nonsense from the Bible (2012)

-  Ballentine - The Conflict Myth and the Biblical Tradition (2015)

-  Beall - The Brain and the Bible; or, the Conflict between Mental Science and Theology (1881)

-  Bernier - Aposynagogos and the Historical Jesus in John; Rethinking the Historicity of the Johannine Expulsion Passages (2013)

-  Burke - Secret Scriptures Revealed; a New Introduction to the Christian Apocrypha (2013)

-  Carmichael - The Book of Numbers; a Critique of Genesis (2012)

-  Dillon - The Sceptics of the Old Testament; Job, Koheleth, Agur (1895)

-  Fletcher-Louis - All the Glory of Adam; Liturgical Anthropology in the Dead Sea Scrolls (2002)

-  Friedman - Who Wrote the Bible, 2e (2011)

-  Hendel - (Ed.) - Reading Genesis; Ten Methods (2010)

-  Hill - Who Chose the Gospels; Probing the Great Gospel Conspiracy (2010)

-  Jones - Putting Together the Puzzle of the New Testament (2009)

-  Kruger - The Question of Canon; Challenging the Status Que in the New Testament Debate (2013)

-  Ledo - On Earth as It is in Heaven; the Cosmic Roots of the Bible (2009)

-  Leloup - The Gospel of Thomas; the Gnostic Wisdom of Jesus (1986)

-  Lim & Collins - The Oxford Handbook of the Dead Sea Scrolls (2010)

-  MacDonald - Does the New Testament Imitate Homer; Four Cases from the Acts of the Apostles (2003)

-  Martin - Secret of the Savior; the Myth of the Messiah in Mark (2013)

-  Mayer - Worlds Made Flesh; Reading Medieval Manuscript Culture (2004)

-  McDonald & Charlesworth (Eds.) - Non-canonical Religious Texts in Early Judaism and Early Christianity (2012)

-  Meyer - The Secret Teaching of Jesus; Four Gnostic Gospels (1984)

-  Nahkola - Double Narratives in the Old Testament; the Foundations of Method in Biblical Criticism (2001)

-  Price - Inerrant the Wind; the Evangelical Crisis of Biblical Authority (2009)

-  Ramage - Dark Passages of the Bible; Engaging Scripture with Benedict XVI & Thomas Aquinas (2013)

-  Russell & Winterbottom (Eds.) - Ancient Literary Criticism; the Principal Texts in New Translations (1972)

-  Ulrich - The Dead Sea Scrolls and the Developmental Composition of the Bible (2015)
